item.title: Hire me
item.description: I offer software development services and I am based in Singapore. I am available for hire on contract basis. My expertise are listed below. MVP and SaaS development Have an idea? I can develop your MVP or SaaS so you can focus on the business side of things. Leave the technical side of things to me Website and application scraping Web and data scraping to automate your job Run scripts to scrape data from websites without public APIs Scripting Speed up your work flow by removing manual and time-consuming tasks Run scripts to connect to various APIs and send SMS or notifications when something happens Web design (HTML5/CSS3) Integrate your brand colors into a coherent web design Custom pages, landing pages, dashboards Interactive and modern design Web development Web applications with logic to do various things Connect to third-party APIs like LinkedIn Plugin development for Wordpress and Shopify Cross-platform development Develop iOS, Android, Linux, Mac, Windows and CLI applications Reverse engineering Help you to find and document hidden APIs behind applications Decompile mobile applications to find bugs and loopholes (Authorisation required from app developer) Rate US$90/hour
